item.title: Jack Dorsey’s Block Is Set to Join S&P 500 Index, Replacing Hess
item.description: Jack Dorsey’s Block Inc. is set to join the S&P 500 index, a milestone that underscores the growing influence of digital payments and crypto in mainstream finance.
